patthana19.12:1.1: Naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.12:2.1: Hetuyā dvāvīsa, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… aññamaññe soḷasa …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate dvāvīsa.
patthana19.12:3.1: Naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.12:4.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe terasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane nava …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana19.12:5.1: Nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.12:6.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana19.12:7.1: Namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.12:8.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana19.12:9.1: Namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
